website_summaries.verdict: The best corrosion-resistant multi-access shackle lock for indoor and outdoor use.
pros: Accessible via smartphone, smartwatch, and NFC fob
Admin can control multiple users, either one time or permanently
Traces who used the lock and when
Tough steel shackle and durable, tamper-proof construction
cons: There have been a few app issues, particularly with Apple watch

customer_reviews.title: Stay's on, drains battery, loses connection
customer_reviews.text: Not dependable. Worked then now brand new and the beeping is continuous. I wanted to use in car where it would shake and that may cause it to move the shackle which will turn it on. Apple watch only works with it with iPhone app on. App lost link after a few weeks. So all the time savings is gone that I hoped to gain. Battery was drained within a couple days due to the switch issue. I asked first for company to replace and they are slow to approve a defective lock if at all. They have yet to respond to that decision. Be aware that the rubber seal on the shaft may be too thick for holes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: NO USB CHARGER INCLUDED, RIDICULOUS (NOT A STANDARD USB SLOT)
customer_reviews.text: You'll spend nearly $60 on this lock but eGeeTouch is too cheap to include the charging cable for you. They claim to use any standard external USB power source yet their USB slot is not standard. Expect to spend additional money to charge the lock. Very misleading. The packaging FAILS to state"usb charging cable not included" before popping $60 out.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Korbel

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: feels very heavy duty. Had it outside since i got the lock, it rained a couple nights in a row but everything there was absolutely no problem. Very easy to use. We can now even keep track of when the gardener comes so we can calculate monthly payment easier as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chen

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to allow access to a shop for my employees, only lasted about 2 months before wouldn't hold a charge, locks/ unlocks on its own, will not connect and just beeps constantly until battery is dead. Have contacted support, will update this review once they have responded, hoping for a new lock or lock reset as I really want this to work so can track employee access etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Burns

customer_reviews.title: nice lock, great features
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice lock. Feels very solid. Standard lock size which is good. Has some trouble unlocking with the watch but the app works on the phone. the key fob works perfectly. The reason for 3 stars is the app. It wants you to log in with each use (password every time) and keeps asking to turn on NFC (which is already on). Also says it is a trial version (which after paying for the lock you should get the full app). I think its a bit expensive to have these silly issues but the lock itself works great!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck & Soni Frazier

customer_reviews.title: water seals on the bolt are difficult
customer_reviews.text: This lock pretty much does what it says it will do, no false advertising, but read the specs carefully. If you need to actually use this outdoors the seals must be in place. The bolt diameter may fit through your item to be locked, but if the much larger rubber seal doesn't fit cleanly through then you have to pull the seal off the bolt, put the lock in place, reinstall the seal, and finally close the lock. Reverse all that to open.
customer_reviews.author: BLB Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: Works great unlike all the others
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love these locks, I’ve tried at least 6 other padlocks that were Bluetooth or finger recognition and I hated them, waste of time and money, they were cheap looking cheap material with expensive price tag, but these eGeeTouch locks are GREAT iv been using them for 3 months now and I just ordered another two pack, the app works great no problems at all, even works with my Apple Watch very pleased with this lock, 5 start
customer_reviews.author: Vapo768

customer_reviews.title: First Bluetooth/NFC Smart Padlock that actually works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have been watching for a Smart Padlock that was well priced, highly secure (many others are easy to open), able to operate outdoors, and was simple to use. I went through so many others, but I finally found one that just plain works as it should! The eGeeTouch Smart Padlock does all that it says, and is pretty much hassle free. Bluetooth works well, NFC works well, you can use with multiple NFC tags. Battery life is epic, with many others having to be charged every month or two. I rarely write reviews, but this one is well worth it, and recommend it highly for those who have been looking forward to a combo or key padlock replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P B

customer_reviews.title: Cost efficient smart lock
customer_reviews.text: If you have two locks in close proximity and try to unlock one and go to the second one it has trouble communicating with the second lock and you will need to refresh the app so I deducted 1 Star. Overall, so far, I am pleased with the locks. I got this lock for the weather proof and smart technology capabilities. Although I have the one complaint, given the lack in market for smart lock this is a decent lock for the price. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anon yomus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stupid
customer_reviews.text: I brought this thinking it was a fingerprint lock. It is not. True that you do not have to remember a number or a key. Instead, you have to remember to have a key fob with you. What's the difference??? The lock was heavy, felt sturdy and looked good. But if I didn't have the fob, it was as irritating as forgetting a number or a key.
customer_reviews.author: MARK S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient lock.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little lock that I added to my work collection. Very sturdy with a heavy duty feel. The NFC key fob access is very convenient. I just wish the lock came with more fobs. I use it indoors so I’m not sure how it holds up harsh environments. Being able to share access with coworkers is critical. Being able to use my Apple Watch is a nice bonus feature!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I used it for a couple months, and still works great
customer_reviews.text: I have had the lock installed in a pedestrian gate which is exposed to rain. So far there have been no issues. I have had inconsistent results opening the lock with the keyfob, but the app works every time. It would have been better if the lock could be operated using an apple watch app, without needing the phone to be nearby. So far I'm very pleased with the performance of the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha Perai

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Clear Instructions and Easy to Set up
customer_reviews.text: Just received my 3rd Gen Smart Padlock and it was pretty easy to set up. Will be using this lock to give access to the storage unit for our employees. I have high hopes for this product and will update accordingly if anything goes array. So far so good. I like that you can use your phone or watch. Love being able to grant and take away access remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Selle E

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 1wk in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Update: after being exposed to rain for less than a wk, lock is stuck. Tried to recharge but still does not open. The beeping sound is there but no click. What a waste! I am impressed abt how durable this padlock looks and feels. I have not used it for its intended purpose yet so I cannot write abt that. I did find a little difficulty pairing it with the android app. But once that was done register ing the key fobs and unlocking using Bluetooth was a breeze. I hope it will last. I like it already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lock works, weatherproofing boot makes it not fit
customer_reviews.text: The locks have worked thus far (I bought 3 to secure my gates and shed without having to worry about keys). My complaint is the rubber seals that help make it weatherproof - they’re too large to fit in a standard hole for a lock shackle. The shackle fits, but not the boot. I’ve had to remove the boot every time I take the lock on or off, and after just a month, all that wear has cracked one of the boots.
customer_reviews.author: blockdoc

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good...nothing to pick.
customer_reviews.text: The only gripe is the rubber being on the bar and not the lock, it already tore on one of them passing through the hole on the latch. Nothing to pick and not online, seems pretty secure. Haven't tested against a shim uet but it's pretty tight, and heavy duty. I like that it's off until you wake it to conserve battery.
customer_reviews.author: Nic.K

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use, Durable Weatherproof Lock!  BUY THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lock based upon the weatherproof and electronic function. From the setup the lock was very easy to set up. Just follow the instructions that are given with the lock. I had a little trouble paring the key fob as I didn't read that it is already paired. Setting up and using with my iPhone and watch has been simple and easy and excited to use this on my shed. The lock is very heavy feeling and looks very well built, indication should with stand the weather elelemets. BUY THIS LOCK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Solid Lock - App needs some work
customer_reviews.text: The lock feels very solid and works great out of the package. I think the phone app is a little difficult to work with and needs a lot of attention. I would give this lock 5 stars if they would improve the phone app and allow you to take back access that you send to someone else from the app. Since they manage the app, I would think they could just delete the user anytime. I am likely to buy other locks from eGeeTouch.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is AWESOME. You need to use your phone or the included fob to make it unlock, but it works great! If you are looking to unlock something with using her your phone, then this is the product for you. Note: you do have to open the phone app to unlock it.
customer_reviews.author: Othersfirst

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST-LOCK
customer_reviews.text: Genius idea to make this lock digital!! We needed a lock for our front gate, when shopping I came across this lock and thought, too good to be true, nope, it's true. I received it in the mail, charged it, downloaded the app, registered the lock and started using it. I'm now going to purchase additional tags for my family to have access to this lock. Ways to share the lock: the tags or have family members download the app
customer_reviews.author: Velia Cox

customer_reviews.title: Software is unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to use the lock for a farm gate, but the software is so unreliable, it would be more difficult to use than my normal combination lock. The software is very buggy, doesn't always connect with the lock, and is a very slow pairing process, which I tested over and over and take a long time to complete. so wouldn't be so bad if you could pair the lock with your software / phone once, but it loses the pairing information and has to be done multiple times. If you have multi-users, wanting to open the lock it would be nearly impossible to teach them how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution after lengthy setup
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lock for the front gate of our vacant property. With ongoing modifications & enhancements to the property, we needed to restrict access to the public and permit access to contractors. This lock is the perfect solution. I can manage and control who has access and when. The ONLY issue I had was getting the lock connected to the app. Once it was connected, it's the perfect solution to our needs.
customer_reviews.author: D & J Jones

customer_reviews.title: What a smart lock!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lock to secure my backyard shed. I have cut sooooooo many locks off that shed, because I couldn’t find the key because “somebody” never puts it back when they’re done with it. This appears to be the last lock I’ll ever have to purchase my shed. The lock is sturdy and made of good quality materials. It took minutes to set-up and begin using. I tested locking and unlocking the lock via Bluetooth and NFC tag, and it performed beautifully. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Rooths

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous 21st century technology!
customer_reviews.text: We've had many locks on this gate, but they never lasted out in the weather. Now that we REALLY needed one that would last because we had something important to protect, I said, "wouldn't it be great if we could find a well-built lock that was weatherproof?" Not only is it well-built and weatherproof, it's Bluetooth and we don't need keys or a combination!! And it can be unlocked remotely, even if we're not home! It's fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: pixburgh

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a smartwatch!
customer_reviews.text: The lock works exactly as I hoped it would. I bought it for the gym so I wouldn’t have to carry a key with me but could unlock it with my watch. Like I said, functioned perfectly. Here’s what wouldn’t work for me: it’s big. It was too big to fit in the space provided in my gyms lockers so ultimately I couldn’t use it. Granted our lockers are very small so if you’ve got normal sized lockers don’t let this stop you. The lock is just slightly bigger than your standard padlock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for dorm desk!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is using this for her lockable drawer in her dorm. She likes that she can use her phone, watch, or fob to open. I am not sure if this one is touch capable?? But she doesn't seem to mind. She was recommending to her roommates who have keyed locks.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L. Wilds

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, secure and durable. Smart Software-Easy to share access
customer_reviews.text: This smartlock is impressive. It was easy to set up (once I understood what the "power on" button was). The fact that is is so durable and waterproof makes it a must have for my shared spaces. I highly recommend it! Great job EgeeTouch!
customer_reviews.author: Ted V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lock, Sturdy and Great Value for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lock to lock a side gate but give me a way to unlock it from in the house. This lock fit the bill and was a 1/4 of the price of any competitor and much less complicated to install. Lock fit perfectly and is sturdy, secure and a great buy! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: jcgrim

customer_reviews.title: the lock stands up to all wet weather.
customer_reviews.text: The app on the smart phone works great to lock and unlock the device and a log is kept for time and date of lock or unlock and location. I noticed though that if you use the FOB a log is not kept of open and lock.
customer_reviews.author: reh9989

customer_reviews.title: Great keyless lock!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to set up. Had no problems at all. It instantly paired with my iphone and I was able to lock and unlock with ease using the app on my phone and Apple Watch. It is heavy duty. Better than what I expected. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Russell

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This lock is absolutely fantastic easy to use you don't have to remember any combinations you simply pair to your phone and off you go! Fantastic product I bought four locks. Wish I could afford more. Thanks for bringing this baby boomer into the future!
customer_reviews.author: ALVIN C.

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and have tested it however, have not used it outdoors just yet. However, I can see it will work just fine. Love the feature of the NFC chip and being able to open it without the app. So far so good, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Engracio

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Easiest to use lock I own! Could use an alarm- that would make it so I didn't need a separate lock. The weather sealing would appear to be compromised if the rubbers on the lock arms are not covering where the the arms go in the lock body. I had to remove a rubber to make it work with a smaller diameter latch, so we'll see how weather-proof this ends up being.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: A good choice over other locks, one of the only i've found that takes NFC
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use NFC ring,. it's not supported directly but after another reviewer here posted a workaround, seems like the lock does what I expected. Feels sturdy as other keyed locks i've used. It locks and has multiple ways to open it, thats a plus for me. I'd by another.
customer_reviews.author: labtopia

customer_reviews.title: Works every other time, battery dies in less then one week
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the lock, you want to use. In two weeks time, I had to charge it twice because it went dead. Five times out of ten, I was NOT able to open the lock with my Samsung Galaxy Note 9 and/or Apple iPhone 8 Plus. I threw it away, because it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Doktorovich

customer_reviews.title: Not as weather proof as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought 12 of these locks to secure a little league baseball field but after installing 5 locks, within 2 weeks 4 out of the 5 locks do not work anymore after being in the weather. I do not recommend these locks if they are exposed to outside elements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it
customer_reviews.text: So after getting eGeeTouch pad lock for my shed I must say im really impressed by the setup. Easy as 123 and I work with computers everyday and this . Pros: Great repsonse from phone to unlock and lock device Easy pairing Very durable Multiple devices setup Cons: Make the contact points different to unlock device. Little harder for bigger hands.
customer_reviews.author: L.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fabulous customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It will be complex for some, but their help desk is expert, instantly available, and they stay with you till you catch on completely.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is awesome, responsive, quick to set up and works great on the phone and watch. Love not having to carry keys and always have my phone or watch so quick to get through. Giving access by the app for pest control and seeing the lock and unlock history is great!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Lampert

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The lock itself works as advertised. What is deceptive is that if the lock will be used by more then ten people, it requires a ongoing subscription.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Good option for going keyless.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions included with the lock were clear and concise. Lock has a sturdy feel to it. There is a slight learning curve, especially when using the NFC fob. Overall, this lock provides the most flexibility when going keyless at a far better price than some of the brand name manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The outdoor smart padlock to own
customer_reviews.text: This smart padlock looks and feels very well made. I’m using my iphone, Apple Watch and the smart NFC tag to operate the lock. They all work well. The Apple Watch app could be improved. The iPhone app must be active and linked to the lock before the Apple Watch can open or close the lock. It would be good if the Apple Watch can operate the lock independent of the iPhone app being active. However, I really like thus lock. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Luis T

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a charge. Is not weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: I charged these overnight before using for the first time. 2 weeks later, they both are dead. One I accessed about 100 times, The other zero. I charged them so I could remove/ replace them. The first one charged up enough I was able to replace it. The second one keeps dripping water from the charging port. After 3 hours, I am getting ready to cut it off. Although I like my masterlock, these were cheaper. Spend the extra money on the masterlock, I will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lock that does what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a solid product so far. Takes a little playing with it at first specially when a couple of weeks go by and you forgot steps to take to open like pushing it in for 5 secords for fob. But if you follow the instructions it works. So far so good! Look solid and well build. This is a medium lock. No a bulky high security one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea but needs tweaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 locks - one works and the other does not. It will not pair with my phone at all. Customer support is not good - they emailed me a couple of times but did not provide any solution or offer an exchange. You have to push up on the lock in order to unlock it and it's very difficult. I wanted to provide access to vendors that need to enter my backyard but have not been able to do that because this lock is too difficult to operate. Again, great idea but not ready yet in my opinion - it needs work.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgrlcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock with technology
customer_reviews.text: I like that I just need a phone to unlock instead of remembering a combination. It also has a feature where you can share access with someone for a set period of time which I may use for the yard guy. And has a smart fob for unlocking as well. Very sturdy and the app is easy to use once setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this padlock for about a week, and so far it works well. No issues to date and it's easy to use. One of my main concerns was it would be interfered with by other wireless items around our home and that is deafly not the case. Good product
customer_reviews.author: ANNIE

customer_reviews.title: App is substandard
customer_reviews.text: THE APP IS HORRIBLE. You can’t use the lock without the app. The app glitches, freezes, and crashes. PLEASE UPDATE FOR IPAD AND IPHONE.
customer_reviews.author: Suvid

customer_reviews.title: great smartlock
customer_reviews.text: Great smart padlock great for a multiple person access lock. Only complaint is phone unlock feature is a little bit slower than anticipated but still overall useful. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: lance a. watson

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a keyless lock for my garage (so needed weatherproof) and the eGeeTouch Smart Padlock is perfect. Setup was easy. My only wish is that you could unlock it without having to "power on" (closing the lock) but hopefully next version.... I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: John DeCesare

customer_reviews.title: So tired of looking for my glasses for combo lock.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this long but hope it solves my problem of having to find my glasses and light to use our on our gated driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Mac's Gems

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the keyfobs for these locks for our employees. They were easy to program and easy to use to unlock the locks. Workers love them! Also like the fact that they can use their phones as a backup in case they forget their keys that day.
customer_reviews.author: James Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Padlock I’ve Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lock and it’s so easy to use and set-up. I was also able to share access with my wife on her phone.
customer_reviews.author: Khaki Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, rugged and dependable
customer_reviews.text: The lock is well built. The app is easy to use. And great customer support. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MLewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these locks for security for our company. With many people coming and going its very helpful to have this available to anyone who needs to get in without having keep track of keys. Its perfect for our cold ND winters and very easy to set up and connect to.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Braach

customer_reviews.title: Our New Intelligent Padlock
customer_reviews.text: This lock is pretty cool. Takes a bit of getting used to, so make sure you read all tutorials as its a bit complicated, but really awesome technology.
customer_reviews.author: brenda petty

customer_reviews.title: Too many failures
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 12 of these for my company. Granted we lock/unlock these 10-15 times a day but so far we’ve had 3 failures (had to cut off the lock) in 3 months. 2 wouldn’t stop beeping and wouldn’t unlock and 1 just wouldn’t connect to tags or app anymore. Will update after I attempt to return them all.
customer_reviews.author: Ananda

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: This lock works just as it says it does! I love that I can unlock my gate for the pool guy when I’m not home and no longer have to leave it unlocked all day! I recommend this lock!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie T

customer_reviews.title: controlling access
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lock that I could control access to several people so far it is working great. I have only been using it for a few days it appears sturdy, and that it will hold up to the weather
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: APP Not Always Reliable
customer_reviews.text: The app from the android phone doesn't always connect/sense the lock. The app from the Samsung watch is even more temperamental. Always works with the NFC chip when needed, but then why not just use a conventional lock & key? Otherwise, solid & weatherproof are awesome. Technologically - just not there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed about the padlock is that it feels very sturdy and well-made. It was easy to charge, set-up and operate (though the instructions could probably be a little more descriptive and include more detail). I have used it outside on a gate to our backyard and there have not been any problems so far. I would purchase this padlock again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Just got this padlock for a storage unit. The online videos make setup easy. I wish it had an "invite" option to add a user...looks like the user has to create an account before you can share the lock. Lock seems durable and comes with extra rubber grommets for waterproofing when the installed pair wears out. Also comes with 1 FOB.
customer_reviews.author: CHORD Real Estate

customer_reviews.title: Not really weatherproof...
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this lock and it worked perfectly up until our first bad rainstorm. The battery got fried and now I'm left with a paperweight. Not weatherproof!! Such a dissspointment since everything else works like a charm and being able to open my shed with my phone and smart watch is super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pertle

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2 pack bluetooth locks to allow employees access certain locations in a ministorage. These work great because I can use the app to give them access and allow them to lock and unlock remotely. I can even download the access logs so I can see who and when they accessed the location.
customer_reviews.author: Mitesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: BLUETOOTH LOCKS
customer_reviews.text: LOCKS SEEM TO BE DURABLE AND WORK JUST AS DESCRIBED. WERE DELIVERED PROMPTLY. SO FAR A GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: pdreagan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I recent;y purchased this and am using it on my driveway gate. My gate can only support a padlock, so this was a nice modern, and easy to use touch to opening the gate. It works well, and I am very satisfied with the device. I would recommend it, rather than having to use a key padlock.
customer_reviews.author: RJH0722

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Use NFC Fob much easier, after couple use, one work, another one malfunction
customer_reviews.author: shyr meau chen

customer_reviews.title: only operates for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great concept and the construction is made very well however, the battery life is less than acceptable. I have to charge it every time I need to use it and I only use it once a week. It runs out of battery way too quickly. Either I have a faulty product or the battery life needs to be re-engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Design is very sturdy. I really had some trouble to find the appropriate cable to charge the lock but finally I found it's compatible for either USB micro A or micro B cable. So no issue to use any. The only thing to my concern is the software which is a trial version. I hope it's a free version and works as part of the lock system.
customer_reviews.author: ls

customer_reviews.title: Safe and locked up
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a good lock that I could use remotely.I used the 3rd gen smart padlock to secretly lock my gate to my backyard. When the yard guys arrived all they do is squeeze the lock and i am able to unlock the gate. I plan on getting several more locks like this to secure other things around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald Francois

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lock
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I bought a few Bluetooth locks and this one is a great quality lock. I recommend it over other padlocks. Just wish that when sharing the lock Access with someone that you can limit the time of day that they will have access. Maybe they will make the app more features in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN BOSI

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: As soon as it was cold it lost its charge, then I had to buy an external battery to change it so I could unlock it, after I charged it a week later I went to open my shed and lock was dead again, now I have a 60 doller Paper weight
customer_reviews.author: scott g dalessio

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept. Please note that you have to squeeze lock down for a few seconds (light goes green) to enable reading of NFC fob/tag. Also, app improvements should allow for access to lock configuration review without simultaneous connection to lock. Otherwise, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Syl Tampa Bay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great lock except the rubber gasket on the latch that will not fit through a tight lock hole
customer_reviews.author: John b

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice not to have to look for a key every time I go into my shed.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a decent lock. Only think I didn’t realize is you is that you have to mash the lock to get a signal every time you use it. Also it’s a little pricey. Overall those are not deal breakers.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Must have NFC on phone (I think)
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't use I think because my phone doesn't support NFC. IDK nothing says that you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock! The fob that comes with it had no ID number so I could not use it, but I had ordered extras separately and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave5150

customer_reviews.title: works as stated
customer_reviews.text: It works as stated and can be opened with cell phone or with the fob that comes with the lock. The lock charges bu USB. Hold down for 5 seconds to use the fob and a quick pressdown for the phone. Lock is sturdy and robust. Very nice padlock.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Durability, security doesn’t mean comprising stylish
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and Stylish looking lock firmly built great for outdoors use as well as indoors. I will use it for the gym locker enjoying the convince of key less and one less password to remember as in my old combination lock. One more thing my smart phone can do!
customer_reviews.author: waleed

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth lock Great Price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The set up was very easy. The lock is easy to use. I can not say for sure how it will hold up in the winter yet because it’s summer, but it seems to be very well made. This lock even had as An Auto Unlock feature which you can turn on and off, but I found it very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Marc M

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it... I haven't had it long but it has been in a rain storm and functioned without any issues the next day... I love the app though it does give me a pop up about "free trial advanced version" I'm not sure what that is about.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fryman

customer_reviews.title: Works way better then i expected!
customer_reviews.text: We have multiple users and needed a way to manage access. The NFC tags are perfect choices for this. The only difficult part will be training people how to use it; not that it is hard to use, just they need to hold the clasp closed until you see the green light.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: After a months use this product is everything as advertised. It is very sturdy and looks to be durable and weatherproof. It almost seems that the phone app works better and faster with use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the audit trail feature
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock to control access to a storage area. It was easy to set up and has worked flawlessly so far. I especially like the audit trail so I can keep track of who is coming and going. I will be buying additional locks.
customer_reviews.author: Blueknight

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the padlock, and its easy configuration with IOS tags and cell phone. 100% recommended. It should be noted that I use it in a place where it will not get wet from the rains so I do not know how it works outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Lock
customer_reviews.text: My problem with lock is that you have to use your phone or watch to unlock it. I was wanting something a little simpler to unlock. Like a finger print. But the lock is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Casso

customer_reviews.title: Works just as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up app and share lock with others to access.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: returning both of these locks as they are going dead in 3 days or less. Hopefully the replacements will work better. - - - - - So far these smart padlocks are working great. It makes it very convenient to not have to carry keys around!
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fast pairing to phone the app open & closes with Ease
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this amazing padlock , No more headache trying to remember a 4 digit code or not forgetting to put a key in my bag for a lock . The app on my phone opens and closes this padlock is great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Solomon D.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, convenient and solid! 5-Stars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2 pack and couldn't be happier. Solid construction. The app is way easy to use. And it seems to be ready for the elements. If you are in the game for a sturdy lock with many safe options for sharing access this is the lock system for you.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Langway

customer_reviews.title: Works great with iPhone and Apple Watch app
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with iPhone app, Apple Watch app, and key fob. I use it with a large chain to lock up my motorcycle and it hasn’t been stolen, so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tia M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smart lock
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built really well and intelligent to boot. A number of smart locks dont give you a lot of confidence from theft and I finally found one that is built really strong. Love the key fob and apple watch integration. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Paper weight
customer_reviews.text: Lock was great at first. Easy to operate. But once the battery ran low I was not able to reconnect to lock and it would not close anymore. Sent an email to the customer service and I’ve yet to hear back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but issues with exterior use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use but battery doesn't stay charged in cold and wet weather, even though it is marketed for exterior use. Great for interior use but not reliable outside.
customer_reviews.author: Brody

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 months in and the shackle completely disconnected from the lock.... It’s useless now. Hopefully the company makes it right by replacing under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great - for some but not all use cases
customer_reviews.text: Hardware seems to be of good quality however app is beyond basic and UX is pretty bad. For super simple use cases and small number of users however might be exactly what you need.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a side gate that my gardeners use. Easy to add and remove people for access. I charge it monthly as its used alot.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lock @ an Amazing Price
customer_reviews.text: This lock is easy to set up and use. No gimmicks.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Guy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, weatherproof lock with easy unlocking from your phone
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I needed a sturdy, weatherproof lock to secure my main gate, and this worked perfectly. I love the app access and tag options for this lock. Set-up was easy, pairing was straightforward, and adding users and smart tabs was a snap!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Function
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday. Works great. I ordered 15 fobs so I can track users and history in my plant. Much easier than making and managing duplicate keys
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Merritt

product_meta.title: eGeeTouch Outdoor Smart Padlock 3rd Gen, Weatherproof, Rugged Design for Commercial use, Bluetooth + NFC (Short Shackle)
feature_bullets: LATEST UPGRADED OUTDOOR or INDOOR USE, WATERPROOF, FREEZEPROOF & CORROSION-Resistant (pass highest grade 6 ASTM salt-test). Robust, Rugged & Durable Design for COMMERCIAL use. Latest Upgraded FREE Consumer version App to allow more Fobs/Tags to access on each lock. Introduce Web-base Management Software and Commercial/Enterprise version of App for larger user base and locks (this link to view the software: iam.egeetouch.com)

PIONEER in SMART, KEYLESS & HIGH SECURITY LOCKS: No key, No combination code to remember & No tiny 3-digit-wheels to dials. No more hassle of managing and duplicating large quantity of conventional keys. No more worry on LOCK-PICKING & BUMPING experienced when using conventional locks. Unlocking & tracking with your Apple and Android phones, Apple WATCH & Samsung Gear S2/3. A coin-sized WATERPROOF NFC Fob/Tag included for backup unlocking.

PATENTED MULTIPLE ACCESS METHODS provide EXTRA flexibility & convenience to user's preferred unlocking choices; with smartphone, NFC Fobs/Tags, smartwatch, NFC fob/tag. Multiple Fobs (Up to 20 fobs for FREE Consumer App and over 200 fobs for Commercial App- restrictions may apply) to access each lock and easily set them using the App. For smartphone access, no restriction on number of users. Fingerprint Access: NONE.

SHARED ACCESS & AUDIT TRAILS: Remotely Give Permanent or Timed Access via eGeeTouch Manager App & Trace historical unlocking record on WHO, WHEN & WHERE access made. COMMERCIAL/ENTERPRISE version app also include Web-based ACCESS MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE for Administrators to manage large number of users to ASSIGN, REVOKE/DENY and TRACK access from remote location. Useful for MULTIPLE users on shared gates, doors, lockers, storage rooms. Do NOT remove shackle rubber cover when used OUTDOOR.

RECHARGEABLE battery that last for 7,000 Lock/unlock cycles per-full charge or over 2 years of battery life based on 3 cycles per day usage. SHORT Shackle dim.: length: 1-5/8 in. width: 1-1/2 in. diameter: 1/3in. LONG Shackle model (length: 2-1/2 in.) is separately available in Amazon too. Package includes 1 x Smart Padlock, 1 x Smart NFC Fob and 1 x Quick Guide.
